name: Brown Butter Sauce
keywords: butter, capers, tarragon vinegar, side dish
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan over medium heat, cook butter until brown, 2 to 3 minutes.

Stir in the capers and vinegar; mixture will spatter and foam up. Remove from heat. Continue to stir until foam subsides. Stir in salt and pepper. Pour the mixture on the roe that has been poached in butter.
